thread.title: Blue Jays 'reconstruct' before Sunday's crucial game against the Rangers
thread.title_full: Blue Jays 'reconstruct' before Sunday's crucial game against the Rangers

author: ROBERT MacLEOD
title: Blue Jays 'reconstruct' before Sunday's crucial game against the Rangers
text:
Baseball Brett Cecil of the Toronto Blue Jays is jumps over Mike Napoli of the Texas Rangers after tagging him out in the eighth inning of game two of the American League Division Series Oct 9, 2015 in Toronto. Cecil was injured in the play and left the game. (Mark Blinch For The Globe and Mail) Brett Cecil of the Toronto Blue Jays is jumps over Mike Napoli of the Texas Rangers after tagging him out in the eighth inning of game two of the American League Division Series Oct 9, 2015 in Toronto. Cecil was injured in the play and left the game.(Mark Blinch For The Globe and Mail) ALDS Blue Jays 'reconstruct' before Sunday's crucial game against the Rangers Add to ...
